attributes.action: We insist MPs debate and vote on EU referendum result before Article 50 invoked
attributes.background: The result of the EU referendum was not legally binding. Voters were wilfully deceived about the issues and potential consequences. Our Sovereign Parliament should vote on whether to authorise the invoking of Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty before such a momentous decision is taken.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
